New Records: Victor Wembanyama set a personal record for 3-pointers in a game with seven
Victor Wembanyama became the only San Antonio player ever to make at least six shots from beyond the arc in three consecutive contests
Key Match Events: The Spurs finished the third quarter with a 23-6 run that gave them a 108-91 lead heading into the final stanza
Washington made a spirited comeback in the final minutes, cutting the lead to five points with 23.4 seconds left
Post-Match Reflections: The San Antonio Spurs won consecutive outings for just the second time this year and pulled to.500 after 12 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Poole amassed a season-high 42 points to lead seven Wizards in double-figure scoring
Victor Wembanyama continued his otherworldly play by scoring a career-high 50 points
Others: The game was tied at halftime and was still even five minutes into the third period until the Spurs took the lead
Chris Paul distributed 11 assists for San Antonio
